availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David R. Estill (Fleming County, Kentucky, gunsmith)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, gunsmith. Kentucky native. Married to Harriett Weaver Estill on November 14, 1822. Married to Mary Estill. Father of Ollie Estill, America M. Estill, Lucinda Estill, Sophia Estill, and Harriet Estill. Gunsmith in Fleming County in 1850 and 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 1, p. 339. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 2, p. 128. Elizabeth Prather Ellsberry, comp., Marriage Records of Fleming County, Kentucky, 1798-1851 (Chillicothe, MO: Elizabeth Prather Ellsberry, c1965), 1822 (accessed via Ancestry).
